title: Ep 147: Welcome to the Guns Show
itunes:title: Ep 147: Welcome to the Guns Show
itunes:subtitle: British beauty podcaster Emma Gunavardhana shares how she found her storytelling groove, why discussing beauty is a conduit to talking about mental health, and the beauty products and trends she’s into—and those she’s so over. Plus, more on Glossier Pl...
description:
British beauty podcaster Emma Gunavardhana shares how she found her storytelling groove, why discussing beauty is a conduit to talking about mental health, and the beauty products and trends she’s into—and those she’s so over. Plus, more on Glossier Play and the “Italian manicure.”


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand
